content: A notification has already been sent to the user in the first role, prompting them to fill out the form. You can navigate to the room or share the filling link with the participants.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a notification that informs users they have already received a start notification and can proceed to fill out the form by navigating to the room or sharing the link. It appears in a completed form context, likely on a confirmation dialog or header section of a submitted form.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "navigate to the room" is not accurately translated. "Otağa gedə" literally translates to 'go to the room' which doesn't convey the intended meaning of navigating to a specific location or accessing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The best translation would depend on the context. Possible alternatives include: 'otağa keçid edin' (proceed to the room/link), 'otağa daxil olun' (enter the room/link), or 'otaqla bağlı linkə keçin' (go to the link related to the room).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "filling link" is awkwardly translated as "doldurma linkini". A more natural and accurate translation is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "formanı doldurmaq üçün link" (link to fill out the form) or simply "doldurma linki" if the context makes it clear what the link is for.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You can navigate to the room' is not a direct and natural translation of 'navigate to the room' in this context. It feels slightly awkward in German. A more natural phrasing would be 'Sie können den Raum öffnen' or 'Sie können zum Raum wechseln'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie können den Raum öffnen oder Sie können zum Raum wechseln.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'filling link' is not accurately translated. 'Rellenado' implies filling *something* which is vague. A more accurate translation would specify 'llenado del formulario' or 'enlace para completar el formulario'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Usted puede navegar a la sala o compartir el enlace para completar el formulario con los participantes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'filling link' is not the most natural way to express 'filling link' in French. A more accurate and fluent translation would be 'lien de saisie' or 'lien pour remplir'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: lien de saisie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ձևաթուղթը լրացնելու հրահանգով" (form filling instructions) is a bit clunky. A more natural way to express it would be something along the lines of 'ձևը լրացնելու համար' (to fill out the form).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտատիրոջն առաջին դերում արդեն ուղարկվել է ծանուցում՝ ձևը լրացնելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a colon (:) after the first sentence, which might not be the most common formatting choice in Armenian. A period (.) might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտատիրոջն առաջին դերում արդեն ուղարկվել է ծանուցում՝ ձևը լրացնելու համար։ Դուք կարող եք անցնել սենյակ կամ լրացման հղումը տրամադրել մասնակիցներին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'prompting them to fill out the form' is translated as 'invitandolo a compilare il modulo'. While not incorrect, 'prompting' implies a more direct instruction than 'invitandolo'. A more accurate translation might be something like 'sollecitandolo a compilare il modulo' or 'chiedendogli di compilare il modulo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: sollecitandolo a compilare il modulo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "You can navigate to the room" is translated somewhat awkwardly as "ルームに移動するか". While technically correct, it doesn't convey the intended meaning of accessing/viewing the room within the application's interface. A more natural translation would emphasize accessing the room within the system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームで確認するか

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'filling link' is translated literally as '記入リンク'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing would be '入力リンク' or 'フォームへのリンク', depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フォームへのリンク

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "prompting them to fill out the form" is not accurately translated. "ເຕືອນໃຫ້ເຂົາເຈົ້າຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ແບບຟອມ" literally translates to 'warning them to fill in the form.' While understandable, 'prompting' suggests a gentler nudge or reminder, which is a more accurate representation of the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation like: "ເຕືອນຊວນໃຫ້ເຂົາເຈົ້າຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ແບບຟອມ" (warning/encouraging them to fill out the form) or "ເຕືອນໃຫ້ເຂົາເຈົ້າເຮັດແບບຟອມໃຫ້ຄົບຖ້ວນ" (warning them to complete the form).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the Lao translation uses a longer sentence structure. For better readability in a user interface, breaking the sentence into shorter, more digestible parts could improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider splitting the sentence into two: 'ການແຈ້ງເຕືອນໄດ້ຖືກສົ່ງໄປຫາຜູ້ໃຊ້ໃນບົດບາດ ທຳ ອິດແລ້ວ. ທ່ານສາມາດເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງ ຫຼື ແບ່ງປັນລິ້ງຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນກັບຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໄດ້.' (A notification has already been sent to the user in the first role. You can navigate to the room or share the filling link with the participants.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "met het verzoek om het formulier in te vullen" is a bit clunky. A more natural Dutch phrasing would be something like "om het formulier in te vullen" or "om het formulier te openen en in te vullen".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Er is al een melding verzonden naar de gebruiker in de eerste rol om het formulier in te vullen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de link naar het vullen" is awkward. It's not immediately clear what 'vullen' refers to here. A better phrase would be "de link om het formulier in te vullen".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: U kunt naar de kamer navigeren of de link om het formulier in te vullen met de deelnemers delen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de la nivel de rol superior" (from a higher role level) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "in the first role." It implies a hierarchical role relationship that isn't necessarily present. It is too literal and slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O notificare a fost deja trimisă utilizatorului din rolul inițial, solicitându-i să completeze formularul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "solicitare" can be ambiguous. While technically correct, in this context it's not the most natural or clearest way to phrase it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O notificare a fost deja trimisă utilizatorului din rolul inițial, solicitându-i să completeze formularul. (No change to the word itself, but reconsider the phrasing around it).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation could benefit from a slight rephrasing to improve flow and readability. Breaking the longer sentence into two shorter sentences can enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O notificare a fost deja trimisă utilizatorului din rolul inițial, solicitându-i să completeze formularul. Puteți accesa această sală sau puteți partaja link-ul de completare cu participanții.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔවුන් පොළඹවයි" (they are prompted/encouraged) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'prompting them to fill out the form'. It suggests encouragement rather than a notification with a request.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෝරමය පුරවා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය බව දැනුම්වත්වා ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පිරවුම්' (piruwum) in 'පිරවුම් සබැඳිය' (piruwum sabandhiya) is awkward and not the standard term for a 'filling link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පුරවා ගැනීමේ සබැඳිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability in Sinhala. Combining the two sentences would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පළමු භූමිකාවේ පරිශීලකයා වෙත දැනටමත් දැනුම්දීමක් යවා ඇති, පෝරමය පුරවා ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය බව දැනුම්වත්වා ඇත. ඔබට කාමරයට සැරිසැරීමට හෝ සහභාගිවන්නන් සමඟ පුරවා ගැනීමේ සබැඳිය බෙදා ගැනීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'roli' is incorrect. It should be 'role'. 'Rola' is the correct Slovak word for 'role'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Používateľovi zaradenému do prvej roly už bola zaslaná výzva na vyplnenie formulára. Môžete prejsť do miestnosti alebo zdieľať odkaz na vyplnenie s účastníkmi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prompting' is translated as 'позивајући' which is a bit too formal. A more natural translation would be something along the lines of 'уз позив да...' or 'са молбом да...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Обавештење је већ послато кориснику у првој улози, уз позив да попуни образац.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a minor inconsistency. 'popuni' is correct, but 'popunjavanje' in 'link za popunjavanje' feels slightly redundant. A more concise option would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: link za obrazac

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "navigate to the room" is too literal and doesn't translate well in this context. It's unclear what 'room' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'You can access the form' or 'You can proceed to the form.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "share the filling link" is awkward. "Link za popunjavanje" is grammatically correct but not as natural as possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'podeliti link za pristup obrascu' (share a link to access the form) or 'dati link za popunjavanje obrasca' (give a link to fill out the form).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'first role' is ambiguous and doesn't directly translate well. It's unclear what 'role' refers to in this context. A more natural translation would be something that clarifies who received the initial notification (e.g., 'first person', 'primary user').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formu doldurması için ilk kişiye/birincil kullanıcıya bildirim gönderildi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'doldurma bağlantısını' is slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it's not the most natural way to say 'filling link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: doldurma bağlantısını veya formu doldurma bağlantısını

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "prompting them to fill out the form" is not accurately reflected in the Ukrainian translation. "З проханням заповнити форму" (with a request to fill out the form) is a bit formal and doesn't convey the proactive prompting nature of the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more active phrasing like "щоб заповнити форму" (to fill out the form) or "для заповнення форми" (for filling out the form).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow in Ukrainian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rearranging the second part to read: "Ви можете перейти до кімнати та поділитися посиланням для заповнення з учасниками." (You can go to the room and share the filling link with the participants.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "prompting them to fill out the form" is not accurately conveyed by "提示他们填写表单". "提示" implies a gentle suggestion, while the English conveys a more direct prompting. A more appropriate translation would emphasize the directive nature of the notification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 已向第一个角色的用户发送通知，要求他们填写表单。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'participants' is better translated as something that accurately represents who is filling out the form.  '用户' in this context is too general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以在房间或与参与者分享填写链接。
